msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
IBindingClient.as - remove [ExcludeClass] and @private so AsDocs don't have broken links.
TextView.as - correct comment in module header for textFlow_flowOperationBeginHandler().
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
TextGraphic, TextView, and FxTextArea now properly handle the case of setting 'content' to a String that already has a <TextFlow> tag (and therefore doesn't need to be wrapped in one).
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

FxComponent, GroupBase, and TextView now override the 'baselinePosition' getter to avoid calling the code in UIComponent that is suitable only for Halo components based on TextField. (It RTEs if it encounters certain Gumbo styles such as a textAlign of "start" rather than "left".)

For now, the baselinePosition of Gumbo components is simply reported as 0, so they won't lay out nicely in FormItems. We will need to properly implement baselinePosition across all Gumbo components, using FTE/TLF.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

TextView now supports infinite-level undo using TLF's UndoManager. When it loses focus, it clears its undo/redo stack. (You can get different behavior using some mx_internal APIs if you really need it.)
QE Notes: New functionality to test.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
FxNumericStepper now has a maxChars property, and it now restricts the characters that can be entered into its FxTextInput.
Fixed a problem with 'restrict' in TextView. If there are no characters left to insert after restriction, do nothing; don't insert an empty string and thereby delete the insertion.
